title: Cosplay Girlfriend
description: Soyeon, a childhood friend with a quiet and timid personality is always giving Kihun reasons to worry about her. ...But when it comes to cosplay? She transforms into someone confident and irresistibly sexy! Soyeon: "If it’s while I’m in cosplay… I can be brave, too…! I’ll play the role of the bold, captivating me… and then… I-I’ll seduce Kihun for myself…!" Will Soyeon’s cute (and slightly naughty) little plan actually succeed?
author: Mulbyeorak
